General.Name: Suzhou Electrical Apparatus Sci
General.Description: Suzhou Electrical Apparatus Science Academy Co., Ltd. provides high and low voltage electrical apparatus testing services. The company provides testing services for high-voltage switchgear equipment, transformer instruments and reactors, capacitors, arresters, insulators, low voltage electrical apparatus, machine tool electric apparatus, wind power generation equipment, electric power fitting, EMC, seismic, chemical substances, and environmental material. It also offers testing services for electrical lighting equipment and electronic information products, solar photovoltaic power generation equipment, non-destructive, automotive electric and electronic products, accumulator and charging equipment, electromotor, explosion-proof products, nuclear power and marine electrical products, and mines and locomotive electrical apparatus. In addition, the company provides industry and calibration services. Suzhou Electrical Apparatus Science Academy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is based in Suzhou, China.
